Text.Page:
We need you to hunt {@LinkCreature:18#1#Desert Fire thrashers}, {@LinkCreature:18#2#shamans}, {@LinkCreature:18#8#destroyers}, and {@LinkCreature:18#9#prophets}.

Report to Tirian at the Colossal Ruins when you've finished that up.

Fewer of them is always better.

Please, take this.
Surely you're not hiding from your duties?
